title: Topic 001 Question 187
body: If a DevOps team adopts AWS CloudFormation as their standardized method for provisioning public cloud resources, which of the following scenarios poses a challenge for this team?
options: The team is asked to build a reusable code base that can deploy resources into any AWS region
The team is asked to manage a new application stack built on AWS-native services
The organization decides to expand into Azure and wishes to deploy new infrastructure using their existing codebase
The DevOps team is tasked with automating a manual provisioning process
